name: ITroubled
description:
PLAY ITROUBLED IN FULLSCREEN (mobile not supported)

⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️: Move around, pick up and drop items.

☕️Take the coffee for a short speed boost.

You have to keep the office up and running until 6PM. 

This game is best played in fullscreen. Mobile devices not supported.

------------------------------------

Alternative game link (in case the above is not working).

------------------------------------

This game was built in 48 hours, by Renan Lopes, Jeanluic Zammit and Paulo Amaral during the Global Game Jam 2020, at the Institute of Digital Games jam site in Msida, Malta 🇲🇹. It got 2nd place in the jam site (popular vote).

  • Original page (from the Global Game Jam website).
  • Game source (github)
  • Built using GDevelop5, an intuitive event-based game development platform.

------------------------------------

Technology and computers make our lives more interesting by introducing unique problems and their very own levels of trouble. You got a virus, internet is down, the computer is on fire ... When everything seem lost, we call for these unsung and many times unappreciated office heroes without a cape. "IT people", "tech support", "helpdesk", "the weirdos downstairs", whatever you call them, the avengers of all your tech suffering will be there for you. After a cup of coffee.

------------------------------------

This game was developed by

  • RENAN LOPES - linkedin | youtube
  • JEANLUC ZAMMIT
  • PAULO AMARAL - itch | linkedin | github

"Subject: Fire. Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to inform you of a fire that has broken out on the premises of 123 Cavendon Road... no, that's too formal. [deletes text, starts again] Fire - exclamation mark - fire - exclamation mark - help me - exclamation mark. 123 Cavendon Road. Looking forward to hearing from you. Yours truly, Maurice Moss"
